snippet: In a letter that discussed fund-raising plans, the Dalton School inadvertently provided information on whether the children of some alumni had been accepted for entry.
abstract: Dalton School, one of Manhattan's top private schools, says it mistakenly released information on whether children of some alumni had been accepted for entry, something  most parents prefer remain private, especially in cases of rejections.
lead_paragraph: In a letter that discussed fund-raising plans, the Dalton School inadvertently provided information on whether the children of some alumni had been accepted for entry.

headline.seo: Dalton School Mistakenly Shares Admission Information
headline.main: School Mistakenly Shared Private Admissions Data
headline.print_headline: School Mistakenly Shared Private Admissions Data
